original_title: El Enfrascador de Almas (Una historia de Eraclio Zepeda)
overview: An outsider man comes across the house of El Enfrascador de Almas. Without him knowing, the outsider listens to the detailed explanation of what an Enfrascador does in the day-to-day work of trade.
tagline: The film adaptation of Eraclio Zepeda's original short story
title: El Enfrascador de Almas (Una historia de Eraclio Zepeda)
